name: FINDING YOUR WAY IN A MAZE OF OPPORTUNITY - pt II
description:
FINDING YOUR WAY IN A MAZE OF OPPORTUNITY - pt II is the second part of a three part series made with and for Hydra.

Hydra is a platform for live coding that works like a video synth, but with code. You can try it at hydra.ojack.com.

I use Hydra for almost everything I make in this space. It is very intuitive to me and it never seizes to surprise. The three pieces that make up this series are minted on a collaborative contract with a wallet created by the collective Hydra-users on Tezos for the purpose of helping the development of Hydra. 

50 % of the profits of this piece will automatically be sent to Hydra through OpenCollective (https://opencollective.com/hydra-synth).

FINDING YOUR WAY IN A MAZE OF OPPORTUNITY is as much about my personal journey through Hydra, as it is a metaphor for how I feel about the entire NFT space. 

Coded in Amsterdam with Hydra. 
december 2021.
